HTML Tutorial Part 3

This continues the tutorial on HTML. It discusses how to add Java applets to a Web page, how to add images to a Web page, and how to use HTML tables.

Chapter Topics:

  • Applets.
  • Images.
  • Tables.

Part 5 of these notes covers Java Applets. This part of the appendix does not discuss how to create applets, but discusses how to include an applet in a Web page.

QUESTION 1:

What is a Java applet?
